required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Totum-070 on Lipid Metabolism in Moderate Hypercholesterolemic Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Placebo-controlled Double-blinded Study of the Effect of TOTUM-070 on Lipid Metabolism in Moderate Hypercholesterolemic Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This clinical study aims to assess the efficacy of TOTUM-070, a mix of 5 plant extracts, on lipid metabolism in moderate hypercholesterolemic subjects. The hypothesis is that TOTUM-070, daily consumed, is superior to placebo for decrease of fasting blood LDL-cholesterol concentration (determined by ultracentrifugation method) after 24 weeks of consumption.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Fasting blood LDL cholesterol concentration at V3 with ultracentrifugation method
primary_outcome.description: Fasting blood LDL concentration (in g/L) with ultracentrifugation method, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood LDL cholesterol concentration with ultracentrifugation method
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline) and V2 (12 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Fasting blood LDL cholesterol concentration (in g/L) with ultracentrifugation method, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of triglycerides
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Triglycerides (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of total cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Total cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of HDL cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: HDL cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of non-HDL cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: non-HDL cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of LDL cholesterol (Friedewald method)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: LDL cholesterol (in g/L, Friedewald method), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of free fatty acids
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Free fatty acids (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood glycemia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Glycemia (in mg/dL), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood hsCRP concentration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: hsCRP (in mg/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of apolipoprotein-A1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Apolipoprotein-A1 (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentration of apolipoprotein-B
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Apolipoprotein-B (in g/L), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of atherogenic index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Atherogenic index, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of atherogenic coefficient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Atherogenic coefficient, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of Cardiac risk ratio 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac risk ratio 1, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of Cardiac risk ratio 2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac risk ratio 2, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of Apo-B/Apo-A1 ratio
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the body weight
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Body weight (in kg), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the waist circumference
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Waist circumference (in cm), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the hip circumference
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Hip circumference (in cm), TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the waist to hip ratio
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Waist to hip ratio, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Delay of occurence of pharmacological treatment requirement for hypercholesterolemia from V1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Delay between V1 and the date at which the investigator will decide to withdraw the subject from the study because he needs a pharmacological treatment to treat his hypercholesterolemia, TOTUM-070 vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the cardiovascular disease risk (SCORE value)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Systematic Coronary Risk Estimation value from Heartscore calculator

arm_group.description: Experimental active diet supplement TOTUM-070 taken 2 times per day
Placebo comparator taken 2 times per day

intervention.description: 5-g dose of TOTUM-070 diet supplement, a mix of 5 plant extracts. Eight capsules per day to consume orally in two intakes
Placebo. Eight capsules per day to consume orally in two intakes

facility.name: Unité d'Investigation Clinique Biofortis Mérieux NutriSciences
